about_app.title: About App:
about_app.content: Gulf Cardio-metabolic Masterclass is intended to support the continuous medical education of healthcare professionals around the topics of Diabetes, Cardiovascular diseases, Dyslipidemia, and other related Cardio-metabolic syndrome. Highly interactive and intuitive to help you quickly access the latest updates in management guidelines and protocols provided from top notch medical faculty.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy:
privacy.content_first: This program is created and delivered by OTB Life Science & Technology Consultancy FZ LLC, in collaboration with various international Academic Institutes and speakers. Neither OTB Life Science nor the sponsor are responsible and have no influence on the scientific content of the program. For Privacy related topics, please refer to the Privacy Policy section.

content_second.title: Know Your Patient:

content_third.title: Speakers Q & A:
content_third.content: Where you will be able to ask the speakers questions related to the program. You will get the reply directly to your email mailbox.

content_forth.title: My clinic:
content_forth.content: An interactive simulation of cases to help you visualize and assess each case and view various opinions from experts on pathways of treatment. You will need to answer the questions to move to the next session.

content_fifth.title: Favorites:
content_fifth.content: Items that you would like to view later can be marked as favorites and accessed from a single location here
